UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Activity of Novel Synthetic Peptides against Candida albicans.
Literature.Author: Lum KY, Tay ST, Le CF, Lee VS, Sabri NH, Velayuthan RD, Hassan H, Sekaran SD

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>256 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>256 µg/ml,Human vaginal epithelial cells VK2/E6E7:IC50=8.67±2.21 µg/ml,Human esophagus epithelial cells Het-1A:IC50=9.73±1.19 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=32µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=64µg/ml),Candida krusei ATCC 6258(MIC=32µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=32µg/ml)
